card.name: Mew
Red
card.text: [+1]: Exile the top two cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast Pokémon cards exiled this way. [−3]: Create Red's Pikachu, a legendary 4/4 white and red Electric Pokémon with first strike, lifelink, and haste. [−7]: You may put any number of Pokémon cards from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Blue
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player attacked you last turn, draw a card. [+1]: The next Pokémon spell you cast this turn costs {1} less to cast for each Pokémon your opponents control. [-3]: Create a token copy of target Pokémon you don’t control, except it has haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Green
card.text: You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to evolve Pokémon. [+1]: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's an artifact card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand. [−3]: Search your library for a Pokémon card with Evolve From. You may evolve it without paying its cost. Then shuffle.

card.name: Brock
card.text: [+1]: Up to one target Pokémon gets +2/+2 until end of turn. [−2]: Until end of turn, Pokémon you control enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on them. [−4]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a Pokémon you control evolves, put two +1/+1 counters on it."

card.name: Misty
card.text: Whenever a spell or ability you control counters a spell, put two loyalty counters on Misty. [-2]: Draw a card. [−3]: Each player chooses a Pokémon they don't control and gains control of it.

card.name: Lt. Surge
card.text: [+1]: Pokémon you control get +1/+0 and haste until end of turn. [−2]: Pokémon you control with first strike gain double strike until end of turn, then Pokémon you control gain first strike until end of turn. [−4]: Untap all Pokémon you control that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Erika
card.text: [+1]: Create a 1/1 green Grass Poison Pokémon token with lifelink named Oddish. [-2]: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. [−X]: Pokémon you control get +X/+X until end of turn.

card.name: Koga
card.text: [+1]: Up to one target Pokémon gets +1/+0 and gains wither until end of turn. [-2]: Put two -1/-1 counters on target Pokémon. You gain life equal to the number of counters on that Pokémon. [−6]: You get an emblem with "Pokémon you control have {B}: this Pokémon gains shadow until end of turn."

card.name: Sabrina
card.text: [+1]: Look at the top card of each opponent's library. Then scry 1. [-3]: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card second from the top. [-8]: Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Blaine
card.text: [+1]: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. [-2]: Blaine deals damage to target Pokémon equal to the number of Mountains you control. [-3]: Target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.

card.name: Giovanni
card.text: [+1]: Draw a card and you lose 1 life. [-2]: Each player sacrifices a Pokémon or trainer. [-6]: Search target opponent's library for a Pokémon card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles.

card.name: Professor Oak
card.text: [+1]: Until end of turn, Pokémon enter the battlefield with your choice of a lifelink counter or a first strike counter on them. [-3]: Exile target Pokémon with power greater than its toughness. [-7]: You get an emblem with "Pokémon you control have indestructible."

card.name: Lorelei
card.text: Whenever you gain life, put a loyalty counter on Lorelei. [-2]: Tap or untap target Pokemon. [-X]: Put a Water and/or Ice Pokémon card with mana value X from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Bruno
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a loyalty counter on Bruno. [-1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Pokémon. [-3]: Pokémon you control with +1/+1 counters on them gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Agatha
card.text: Whenever a Pokémon with a soulbind counter on it dies, exile it. Create a token copy of it, except it's a Ghost. [+1]: Put a soulbind counter on target Pokémon. [-2]: You may sacrifice a nontoken Pokémon. If you do, draw two cards.

card.name: Lance [PTCG]
card.text: [+1]: Lance deals 3 damage to target Pokémon. You gain 3 life. [-3]: Until end of turn, Lance becomes a 6/6 Dragon Pokémon with flying, vigilance, and indestructible. [-8]: Gain control of all Pokémon.

card.name: Bill
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Poké Ball
card.text: Exile the top three cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may cast Pokémon cards exiled this way.

card.name: Great Ball
card.text: Scry 3. You may reveal the top card of library. If a Pokémon card is revealed this way, you may put it into your hand.

card.name: Safari Ball
card.text: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to one Pokémon card with mana value 4 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Ultra Ball
card.text: Search your library for a Pokémon card with mana value lesser than the total mana value of Pokémon target opponent controls. Put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle.

card.name: Master Ball
card.text: Search your library for a Pokémon card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Switch
card.text: Choose target Pokémon you control. Reveal a Pokémon card with equal or lesser mana value from your hand. If you do, return the chosen Pokémon to your hand and put the revealed card onto the battlefield.

card.name: Poké Flute
card.text: Untap all Pokémon you control.

card.name: Old Rod
card.text: Search target opponent's library for a Pokémon card with mana value X or less and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles. X can't be greater than 3.

card.name: Revive [PTCG]
card.text: Return target Pokémon card with mana value 5 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Max Revive
card.text: Return target Pokémon card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Energy Search
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put it on the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle.

card.name: Mysterious Fossil
card.text: Search your library for a Pokémon card with fossil and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Explore
card.text: You may play an additional land this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Revitalize
card.text: You gain 3 life. Draw a card.

card.name: Show of Force
card.text: Show of Force deals 1 damage to each Pokémon without flying. Draw a card.

card.name: Investigate
card.text: Scry 2, then draw a card.

card.name: Potion
card.text: Remove target Pokémon you control from combat. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Lemonade
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Pokémon. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Growth
card.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: X Attack
card.text: Target Pokémon gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: X Defense
card.text: Target Pokémon gets +0/+4 until end of turn. Untap it. At this turn's next end of combat, tap each Pokémon that was blocked by that Pokémon this turn and they don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

card.name: Guard Spec.
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Pokémon you control. It gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Antidote
card.text: Remove all counters from target Pokémon or player. You gain life equal to the number of counters removed this way.

card.name: Turn to Stone
card.text: Destroy target Pokémon or trainer.

card.name: Itemfinder
card.text: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Body Slam
card.text: Target Pokémon you control fights target Pokémon you don't control. If the Pokémon you control has trample, excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.

card.name: Slash
card.text: Slash deals 4 damage to target Pokémon.

card.name: Whirlwind [PTCG]
card.text: Return target Pokémon or trainer to its owner's hand. Its controller draws a card.

card.name: Sing
card.text: Tap all Pokémon target player controls. Those Pokémon don't untap during that player's next untap step.

card.name: Swift
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent.

card.name: Disable
card.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it into its owner's hand instead of into that player's graveyard. Spells with the same name as that spell can't be cast until your next turn.

card.name: Fire Spin
card.text: Fire Spin deals 2 damage to target Pokémon. If that Pokémon would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Gust
card.text: Gust deals 2 damage to target attacking Pokémon. If that Pokémon has flying, Gust deals 5 damage to it instead.

card.name: Slam
card.text: Destroy target tapped Pokémon.

card.name: Poison Sting
card.text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target Pokémon. Draw a card.

card.name: Glare
card.text: Target Pokémon can't attack or block this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Flash [PTCG]
card.text: Pokémon get -3/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Night Shade
card.text: Destroy target nonblack Pokémon.

card.name: Aurora Beam
card.text: Exile target Pokémon. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Tackle
card.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking Pokémon.

card.name: Toxic
card.text: All Pokémon get -4/-4 until end of turn.

card.name: Blizzard [PTCG]
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Destroy all Pokémon.

card.name: Reflect
card.text: Counter target non-Pokémon spell.

card.name: Fire Blast
card.text: Fire Blast deals 5 damage to target Pokémon. Overload—Reveal a red Pokémon card from your hand.

card.name: Solar Beam
card.text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, trainer, or token. Overload—Reveal a green Pokémon card from your hand.

card.name: Hydro Pump
card.text: The owner of target nonland permanent puts it on the top or bottom of their library. Overload—Reveal a blue Pokémon card from your hand.

card.name: Release
card.text: Counter target Pokémon spell.

card.name: Vine Whip
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Guillotine
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Target Pokémon or trainer loses indestructible. Destroy it. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Substitute
card.text: Choose one — • Target Pokémon you control gains hexproof from the color of your choice until end of turn. • Target attacking creature becomes blocked.

card.name: Pilfer
card.text: Exile target Pokémon. If you do, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Mirror Move
card.text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Double-Edge
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Pokémon you control. If you do, it fights another target Pokémon.

card.name: Prepare for Trouble
card.text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

card.name: Razor Leaf
card.text: Target Pokémon you control deals damage equal to its power to target Pokémon you don't control. If the Pokémon you don't control has flying, destroy it instead.

card.name: Water Gun
card.text: Counter target spell with mana value X.

card.name: Petal Dance
card.text: Untap all lands you control. Until end of turn, whenever you tap a land for mana, add two additional mana of any color that land could produce.

card.name: Dig
card.text: Create two 2/1 red Ground Pokémon tokens named Diglett.

card.name: Thunder Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {W}. Sacrifice Thunder Stone: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Leaf Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {G}. Sacrifice Leaf Stone: Add {G}{G}.

card.name: Water Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {U}. Sacrifice Water Stone: Scry 3.

card.name: Fire Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {R}. Sacrifice Fire Stone: Fire Stone deals 2 damage to target Pokémon or trainer.

card.name: Moon Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {B}. Sacrifice Moon Stone: Create a Treasure token.

card.name: Ancient Slab
card.text: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Pokémon Storage System
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, exile all cards from your hand face down. At the beginning of your upkeep, return all cards you own exiled with Pokémon Storage System to your hand, then draw a card.

card.name: Town Map
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Town Map: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Super Repel
card.text: Pokémon can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each Pokémon they control that's attacking you.

card.name: Nugget
card.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Nugget: Add one mana of any color. When Nugget is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Mysterious Feather
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Mysterious Feather: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Rage
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon attacks, it deals 3 damage to up to one target Pokémon.

card.name: Ice Beam
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon deals combat damage to a Pokémon, tap that Pokémon and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Hyper Beam
card.text: Enchant Pokémon without an Evolve ability Enchanted Pokémon has "{T}: Destroy target nonland permanent. This Pokémon doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step."

card.name: Swords Dance
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon has "{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this Pokémon. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Swords Dance.”

card.name: Mega Kick
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Flash Enchanted Pokémon gets +1/+1 and first strike.

card.name: Dream Eater [PTCG]
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Freeze
card.text: Enchant Pokémon When Freeze enters the battlefield, tap enchanted Pokémon. Enchanted Pokémon doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Pewter Gym
card.text: Pokémon you control enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on them.

card.name: Cerulean Gym
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, counter that spell if it has the same mana value as the revealed card.

card.name: Vermillion Gym
card.text: Whenever a Pokémon you control attacks, put a charge counter on Vermillion Gym. Remove three charge counters from Vermillion Gym: Put a first strike counter, a vigilance counter or a haste counter on target Pokémon.

card.name: Celadon Gym
card.text: Whenever a Pokémon you control attacks, put a bloom counter on Celadon Gym. Remove a bloom counter from Celadon Gym: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Saffron Gym
card.text: Whenever you scry, look at the top card of target opponent's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that library. If you do, you lose 1 life. Otherwise, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Fuchsia Gym
card.text: If an effect would put one or more -1/-1 counters on a Pokémon, it puts twice that many -1/-1 counters on that Pokémon instead. Whenever a Pokémon would die, if it had any -1/-1 counters on it, exile it instead.

card.name: Cinnabar Gym
card.text: Whenever you attack with one or more Pokemon, choose a number. Then exile the top card of your library. If its mana value is equal to chosen number, you may cast it for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: Viridian Gym
card.text: Pokémon, instants and sorceries have deathtouch.

card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Grassland. {T}, Remove all storage counters from Bill's Grassland: Add {W} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Volcano. {T}, Remove all storage counters from Bill's Volcano: Add {R} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Rainforest. {T}, Remove all storage counters from Bill's Rainforest: Add {G} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Bill's Coastline
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Coastline. {T}, Remove all storage counters from Bill's Coastline: Add {U} for each storage counter removed this way.
